metadata.name: FlyingPiggy
metadata.description:
“创世”即“开天辟地”，代表 WePiggy 的第一座里程碑：流动性迁移的完成，借贷协议自此正式上线。
"飞天"即 "自由飞翔"，意为小猪站在去中心化金融的浪潮之巅，长出翅膀，御风飞翔。持有此卡可获得由 WePiggy 加持的“福乐无边，财富自由”状态。
An NFT for the first milestone of WePiggy: Liquidity Migration Completion, Lending Protocol Official Launch.
"FlyingPiggy" means, DeFi gives piggy wings to fly.
Holder of this NFT will get an "Unlimited Happiness, Wealth and Freedom" buff from WePiggy.
总量(Amount)：198 
品级(Level)：传说(Legendery)
